name: Alone - Ludum Dare 45
description:
Our first time joining a Game Jam. What a blast! This is our game made for Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam. 

Game Jam Theme: You start with nothing

You are stranded in a super hot desert, without anything. Can you make it out alive?

Hint! You need water! Now!

Controls: Arrows
Avarage play time: 10 - 15 min

Our Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/alone-2

For more games and behind the scenes. Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/FragmentGamesHQ
